metadata.title: EthicHub - Investments with Real Impact
metadata.description: Invest in sustainable agricultural projects from small producers. Generate financial returns, social impact, and environmental regeneration.

hero.title: Invest with purpose. Earn returns. Change lives.
hero.description: EthicHub allows you to invest in sustainable agricultural projects from small coffee producers, generating social impact, financial returns, and environmental regeneration.

whatIs.title: What is EthicHub?
whatIs.description: EthicHub is a collaborative investment platform that connects small farmers with fair financing and access to international markets, generating profitability and positive impact.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: To drive financial inclusion, direct trade, and agricultural regeneration through blockchain and decentralized technology.

whyMatters.title: Why does it matter?
whyMatters.description: Worldwide, more than 25 million small coffee farmers pay abusive interest rates due to lack of access to the traditional financial system. At EthicHub we change that.

about.videoTitle: EthicHub - What is it and how does it work?

features.subtitle: We bridge the gap between investors and farmers to enhance financial equity.

impact.title: Social and environmental impact
impact.description: Every euro transforms lives and territories.

security.title: Collective security
security.description: Crowd collaterals that protect your investment thanks to our impact token ETHIX.

transparency.description: Blockchain applied to traceability and trust.

testimonials.title: Community
testimonials.subtitle: Discover why thousands of investors trust EthicHub.

items.quote: EthicHub is an example of how innovation and technology can be a powerful tool to solve social problems and generate positive impact. At Heifer International Mexico we are proud to have an ally like EthicHub that effectively contributes to sustainable development and financial inclusion of agricultural communities. With great enthusiasm we will continue collaborating with EthicHub in the future for the benefit of coffee-producing families.
items.author: Gustavo Maldonado
items.role: Executive Director of Heifer Mexico. Ethichubber since 2023

items.quote: As an investor in EthicHub, I feel part of a community that is changing the world. It's exciting to witness how my investments help improve the lives of small farmers and promote sustainable agricultural practices. Also, knowing that I'm contributing to a greener future gives me great satisfaction. EthicHub has shown me that it's possible to generate financial gains while making the world a better place.
items.author: Isabel Roselló

items.quote: ETHIX is at the center of the compensation system, protecting lenders against potential defaults and rewarding participants with interest that compensates for the risk they absorb. Its value and influence will grow with greater decentralization and governance, as well as with the progressive growth of the project.
items.author: Luis Alberto Rodrigo

items.quote: After investing in more than 17 projects over a 6-year period, I can confidently say that EthicHub is a solid platform for ethical investing with excellent returns. I get an 8% annual return in stablecoins and local farmers have access to fast, cheap, and reliable credit. I am always very grateful to be able to use EthicHub.
items.author: Gary Pierre-Louis

coffee.title: EthicHub Coffee
coffee.subtitle: Specialty green coffee with social impact and real traceability
coffee.description1: EthicHub offers specialty green coffee produced mainly in the Soconusco region, in Chiapas (Mexico), an origin recognized for its exceptional quality and ideal growing conditions. We also have coffee produced in Colombia, Brazil and Honduras.
coffee.description2: Our green coffee beans are sustainably grown by coffee communities that directly benefit from each purchase, where 50% of the profit goes back to producers to improve their land, quality of life, and environmental conservation.

impact.title: Impact coffee
impact.description: Fair price and treatment for farmers and their families.

marketplace.title: Green Coffee Online Shop
marketplace.subtitle: Buy green coffee in 5kg format, ready to ship across Europe
marketplace.description: Our new marketplace is designed for those looking to buy green coffee online quickly, flexibly, and without the need to purchase full bags.
buyerTypes: Professionals who want to try different green coffees.

specialty.title: Specialty coffee
specialty.subtitle: Exceptional quality +82 SCA
specialty.description1: Our coffees have scores above 82 SCA points, guaranteeing exceptional quality.
specialty.description2: The different origins, microclimates, and growing conditions of the regions where we work result in coffees with unique sensory profiles, excellent balance, defined acidity, and great complexity in the cup.
specialty.description3: Explore our annual catalog of specialty green coffee. Each origin offers unique profiles thanks to its soil, climate, and cultivation methods.

variety.title: Wholesale
variety.subtitle: For roasters and distributors
variety.description: If you're looking to buy wholesale green coffee, we offer full bags and high-volume sales for roasters and distributors. Contact us to learn about the availability of micro-lots, seasonal coffees, and specific origins.
features: Green coffee with certifications and complete traceability.

communities.title: Our Farmers
communities.subtitle: Directly support small green coffee producers.
communities.description1: We work with agricultural communities excluded from the traditional financial system, offering them access to fair financing and international markets.
communities.description2: Thanks to this model, producers receive better prices and can export their specialty green coffee without intermediaries.
communities.description3: Each batch of coffee you buy contributes to improving agricultural practices, regenerating soils, and strengthening local economies.

greenCoffee.title: Green Coffee
greenCoffee.subtitle: specialty
greenCoffee.description: Sustainably grown by small producers whose work helps bring some of the world's best coffees to life. Climate and geography give the beans a distinctive body and a pleasant acidity, resulting in exceptional quality. Each lot is carefully selected and fully traceable from origin. Our coffees achieve cupping scores above 82 points under SCA standards.

ethix.title: ETHIX Token
ethix.subtitle: impact
ethix.description: ETHIX is an impact token that reflects trust in our farmers and helps provide guarantees for their loans. To strengthen the system’s security, 50% of the total ETHIX supply is staked within the Compensation System. This increases protection against unexpected events and helps reinforce the long-term sustainability of the model.

testimonials.quote: Working with EthicHub has been transformative for many producers in our program. There are countless stories of small farmers who were once unseen and who now have greater financial freedom to run their farms. It has improved their lives through access to microfinance, and it has also raised the quality of the coffees they produce. Most importantly, we've seen their confidence and capabilities grow year after year. It's been a privilege working with EthicHub for over 3 years.
testimonials.author: Boram Um
testimonials.role:
Coffee producer, roaster, barista, and Q-grader.
EthicHub Originator since 2021.
testimonials.location: Minas Gerais and Espirito Santo, Brazil

testimonials.quote: We’re deeply grateful for the support we’ve received, which has allowed us to turn our passion for producing specialty coffee into reality. With this boost, we’ve been able to refine our processes and care for every detail, from harvest through processing. We’ll keep working with dedication to deliver ever-higher quality and create a positive impact in our community.
testimonials.author: Neri Ortiz

testimonials.quote: We’re incredibly grateful to the entire Ethichubbers community for your support. Coffee and service are our passions, and thanks to initiatives like this we can keep strengthening the sustainability of coffee-growing families. This backing helps us continue working with dedication and improving our project day by day. We remain committed to honoring the origin and creating real opportunities for our communities.
testimonials.author: Delmi & Nicolle Regalado
testimonials.role: Coffee Marketer and Exporter at EthicHub since 2023
